What Groups exist in the Village?

I'm not entirely sure, but from what I've observed there seem to be groups of students from Oak Hill College, locals who frequent Hobbs Cafe, and maybe some smaller groups based on interests or hobbies. I'm still relatively new to the Village though, so I could be missing some groups.
Do you feel as a member of a Group?

Yes, I definitely feel like a member of the Oak Hill College group. I spend a lot of time on campus and have made some great friends there. I also feel like a part of the Twitch streaming community, as I often interact with other streamers and viewers. And I would say I'm a regular at Hobbs Cafe, so I feel like a part of that group as well. Overall, I feel like I belong to different groups and communities within the Village.
What interesting News did you hear from other Village residents recently?

I haven't really heard any interesting news from other Village residents lately. Although, there is a rumor going around that a new coffee shop will be opening up near the college campus. Some students are really excited about it, but I'm not sure if it's true.
